item.title: HackTheBox - Included Writeup
item.author: SH∆FIQ ∆IM∆N
item.description: Enumeration scan top 1000 ports 1 nmap -sC -sV -oN nmap/initial 10.10.10.55 the result nmap initial scan scan all ports 1 nmap -sC -sV -p- -oN nmap/all_ports 10.10.10.55 the result nmap allports scan Open Ports Well, both the Nmap result shows only port 80 just open That’s mean this server have a website Local File Inclusion [LFI] Based on the Nmap scan result, This server has a website Let’s take a look webpage has file parameter When I saw this string that had file as parameter I’m always thinking Local File Inclusion [LFI] Let’s try it with this string: http://10.
